
=head1 NAME

file

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 file_type (character varying(45)) - 
 dir (character varying(512)) - 
 file (character varying(512)) - 
 image (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                                    Table "gcis_metadata.file"
   Column   |          Type          |                     Modifiers                     | Storage  | Stats target | Description 
 -----------+------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------+--------------+-------------
  id        | integer                | not null default nextval('file_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    |              | 
  file_type | character varying(45)  |                                                   | extended |              | 
  dir       | character varying(512) |                                                   | extended |              | 
  file      | character varying(512) |                                                   | extended |              | 
  image     | character varying      |                                                   | extended |              | 
 Indexes:
     "file_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "file_image_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (image) REFERENCES image(identifier)
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
